summary: The Mental Health Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2025 authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide loans and loan guarantees for the construction, renovation, and improvement of pediatric and adult mental health and substance use disorder treatment facilities. It prioritizes projects that increase bed capacity in underserved areas and emphasizes services across the care continuum.  The bill also establishes a Mental Health and Substance Use Treatment Trust Fund and directs funding to community mental health services.
